content: नेत्रं [नयति नीयते वा अनेन नी-ष्ट्रन्] {@--1@} Leading, conducting. {@--2@} The eye; प्रायेण गृहिणीनेत्राः कन्यार्थेषु कुटुंबिनः <ls>Ku. 6. 85</ls>, <ls n="Ku.">2. 29</ls>, <ls n="Ku. 2.">30</ls>; <ls n="Ku.">7. 13</ls>. {@--3@} The string of a churning-stick. {@--4@} Woven silk, a fine silken garment; नेत्रक्रमेणोपरुरोध सूर्यं <ls>R. 7. 39</ls> (where some commentators take नेत्रं in its ordinary sense of the ‘eye’). {@--5@} The root of a tree. {@--6@} An enemapipe. {@--7@} A carriage, conveyance in general. {@--8@} The number ‘two’. {@--9@} A leader. {@--10@} A constellation, star (said to be. {%<ab>m.</ab>%} only in these two senses).
